message.author: David Pierce
message.title: Apple iPad Pro (2024) review: the best kind of overkill
message.description: With an M4 chip, a new OLED screen, a thinner and lighter body, and new accessories like the Pencil Pro and the Magic Keyboard, Apple’s latest tablet is a winner. But iPadOS still holds it back.
message.content: Apple’s latest high-end tablet is a marvel of hardware design still in need of the software and accessories to really make it sing. But wow is it fun to use. The new iPad Pro is a genuine achievement… [+11228 chars]
